snippet: LeBron James, who had missed three games with a strained hamstring, had 27 points as the Heat moved closer to securing home-court advantage for the entire N.B.A. playoffs.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat, with star forward LeBron James back from hamstring injury, move closer to securing home-court advantage for the entire NBA playoffs by beating Philadelphia 76ers, 106-87; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, who had missed three games with a strained hamstring, had 27 points as the Heat moved closer to securing home-court advantage for the entire N.B.A. playoffs.

headline.seo: LeBron James Returns to Lead Heat Over the 76ers
headline.main: James Returns to Lead Heat Over the 76ers
headline.print_headline: James Returns To Lead Heat Over the 76ers
